body:
### Problem

Attempting to build Neovim fails at the linking stage due to missing pthread_getname_np symbol. I have installed all of the required packages - as described for Void Linux in the [BUILD.md](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/blob/master/BUILD.md)

```bash
[petrside@voidlinux neovim]$ uname -r
6.12.16_1
```

```bash
[ 95%] Linking C executable ../../bin/nvim
/usr/bin/ld: /home/petrside/github/neovim/.deps/usr/lib/libuv.a(thread.c.o): in function `uv__thread_getname':
/home/petrside/github/neovim/.deps/build/src/libuv/src/unix/thread.c:967:(.text+0x509): undefined reference to `pthread_getname_np'
/usr/bin/ld: /home/petrside/github/neovim/.deps/build/src/libuv/src/unix/thread.c:967:(.text+0xb7f): undefined reference to `pthread_getname_np'
collect2: error: ld returned 1 exit status
make[3]: *** [src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/build.make:7876: bin/nvim] Error 1
make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/Makefile2:676: src/nvim/CMakeFiles/nvim_bin.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: *** [Makefile:156: all] Error 2
make[1]: Leaving directory '/home/petrside/github/neovim/build'
make: *** [Makefile:93: nvim] Error 2
```

### Steps to reproduce

1. Clone the Neovim repository
```bash
git clone --depth=1 git@github.com:neovim/neovim.git
```
2. Build the executable following [the instructions here](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/blob/master/BUILD.md)
```bash
make CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo
```


### Expected behavior

To build and link successfully.

### Nvim version (nvim -v)

The latest upstream master commit. [56fabca](https://github.com/neovim/neovim/commit/56fabcadb6df46c70402e4f9cd1b851856fb57e9)

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

no

### Operating system/version

void linux kernel: 6.12.16_1

### Terminal name/version

alacritty 0.15.1

### $TERM environment variable

alacritty

### Installation

build from repo
